name: PYR_MEAS_OUT_ADDL_INFO
description: Stores the record-level item type and code pairs that could be imported by payers.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDL_ITEM_TYPE
columns.description: Contains the descriptor for what data element the record-level additional item represents.

columns.name: ADDL_ITEM_CODE
columns.description: Contains the value for the additional record-level item.
